title: O Jesus, Jesus
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c v6 c

v1: For very love, Thy sacred name
v2: I love Thee so I know not how
Thy love is like a burning fire
v3: For Thou to me art all in all;
My heart's desire, my body's strength,
v4: Burn, burn, O love, within my heart,
Till all the dross of earthly loves
v5: O light in darkness, joy in grief,
Jesus, my love, my treasure, who
Can tell what Thou art worth?
v6: What limit is there to this love?
Thy flight, where wilt Thou stay?
On, on! our Lord is sweeter far
c1: O Jesus, Lord, with me abide;
I rest in Thee, whate'er betide;
Thy gracious smile is my reward;
I love, I love Thee, Lord!
